metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28450 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Dnsmasq before 2.90. The default maximum EDNS.0 UDP packet size was set to 4096 but should be 1232 because of DNS Flag Day 2020.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28450` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dnsmasq - 2.86-1.1ubuntu0.3
dnsmasq-base - 2.86-1.1ubuntu0.3
dnsmasq-base-lua - 2.86-1.1ubuntu0.3
dnsmasq-utils - 2.86-1.1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dnsmasq package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.86-1.1ubuntu0.3').
